name: NSURLRequest.CachePolicy
desc: The constants used to specify interaction with the cached responses.

items.name: case useProtocolCachePolicy
items.desc: Use the caching logic defined in the protocol implementation, if any, for a particular URL load request.

items.name: case reloadIgnoringLocalCacheData
items.desc: The URL load should be loaded only from the originating source.

items.name: case reloadIgnoringLocalAndRemoteCacheData
items.desc: Ignore local cache data, and instruct proxies and other intermediates to disregard their caches so far as the protocol allows.

items.name: case returnCacheDataElseLoad
items.desc: Use existing cache data, regardless or age or expiration date, loading from originating source only if there is no cached data.

items.name: case returnCacheDataDontLoad
items.desc: Use existing cache data, regardless or age or expiration date, and fail if no cached data is available.

items.name: case reloadRevalidatingCacheData
items.desc: Use cache data if the origin source can validate it; otherwise, load from the origin.
